user_query: I'm redecorating my living room and I need some ideas for a new color scheme. Can you suggest some random words that can be used as color names? Additionally, provide me with the current stock prices of the top 5 companies in the VN30 index.

TaskList.description: Generate a list of random words that can be used as color names.
Fetch the current stock prices of the top 5 companies in the VN30 index.
